Issue.creator: greg.haskins
Issue.summary: ccenv/goshim build is overzealous in files selected for inclusion
Issue.description: The current build uses a combination of "go list .Deps" and "find" to build a list of files to include in the ccenv container. This means that files like core/chaincode/shim/java/*.class might be included since core/chaincode/shim is subordinate to the chaincode shim. Aside from being suboptimal/confusing, this may sometimes lead to problems compiling. This should be cleaned up.
